name: restnest-postman-template
author: Don Swinscoe <dswinscoe@gmail.com>
description: Simple template for Newman-based Postman API POST of OpenAPI artifacts as Postman collection/environments for use in Postman restnest-e2e workspace

scripts.restnest:generate: yarn && yarn restnest:generate-openapi && yarn restnest:openAPISetupPostman:local && yarn restnest:uploadCollection
scripts.restnest:openAPISetupPostman: export GIT_LAST_MERGE_HASH=`git log --pretty=format:"%ct-%h"  --merges --first-parent -n 1`; cd scripts ; node --max-old-space-size=4096 openAPISetupPostman.js

// scripts explanation.restnest:generate-openapi: Generate dereferenced openapi specs in ../config to ../generated-specs
// scripts explanation.restnest:openAPISetupPostman: Standard Postman collection generation setup - expects parameters, indicated in following local call (supplied in Pipeline queue time variables, see /pipeline)
// scripts explanation.restnest:openAPISetupPostman:local: Setup for local testing, e.g. : gcpAccount (google cloud project id), workspaceId (Postman workspace id), workspaceName (Postman workspace name), serviceName (domain Service name), openApiFolder (../../../openapi/), noRefSpecFolder (generated-specs), noRefSpecName (spec.yaml)
// scripts explanation.restnest:uploadCollection: Posts generated collection with Postman API running in Newman
